properties.name: webdevice.binder
properties.description: SettingsBinder implementation used to bind Settings from Environment.

properties.name: webdevice.eager
properties.description: Instructs the browser to acquire the default device when initialized.

properties.name: webdevice.strict
properties.description: Instructs the browser to raise an exception upon use if a device has previously been acquired during the current scenario.

properties.name: webdevice.scope
properties.description: The spring scope in which the WebDevice bean will be defined.
properties.defaultValue: cucumber-glue when CucumberTestContext is present; webdevice otherwise
